item.title: Federal judge blocks government from detaining Kilmar Abrego Garcia after release
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia is scheduled to appear at an Immigration and Customs Enforcement office in Baltimore on Friday morning.

item.title: WATCH: Drones dropping contraband into prisons fuel scams targeting Americans
item.description: Phones delivered by drones are fueling a scam targeting women in healthcare in Iowa and other states, according to records obtained by ABC News.

item.title: Fired University of Michigan football coach to be arraigned
item.description: Former University of Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore is expected to make his first court appearance on Friday for allegations of assault.

item.title: WATCH: Home Depot target of major theft ring, prosecutors say
item.description: More than $2 million in merchandise was stolen from 128 stores across multiple states.

item.title: WATCH: Wakeboarding Santa spreads holiday cheer
item.description: A man dressed like Santa on a wakeboard entertains beachgoers in Argentina.
